description:
Sysdig Cloud is the first and only monitoring, alerting, and troubleshooting solution designed from the ground up to provide unprecedented visibility into containerized infrastructures. Sysdig Cloud comes with built-in, first class support for Mesos, Marathon, and DC/OS.
This package will automatically deploy the Sysdig Cloud agent container on each Mesos Agent (aka Slave) node in your cluster. Note, for maximum functionality, including full metadata support, you'll still want to manually install the Sysdig Cloud agent container on each of your Mesos Master nodes as well.
name: sysdig-cloud
postInstallNotes:
Sysdig Cloud for DC/OS installed successfully on all Mesos Agent nodes. Your cluster metrics will be available shortly at https://app.sysdigcloud.com.
Note, for maximum functionality, including full metadata support, you'll still want to manually install the Sysdig Cloud agent container on each of your Mesos Master nodes as well. See the docs for complete instructions: http://support.sysdigcloud.com/hc/en-us/articles/207886103
postUninstallNotes:
Sysdig Cloud for DC/OS uninstalled successfully from all Mesos Agent nodes.
Note, if you manually installed the Sysdig Cloud agent container on any Mesos Master nodes, you'll need to manually uninstall there as well.
preInstallNotes:
To complete the install, you'll need to provide your Sysdig Cloud Access Key, which can be found here: https://app.sysdigcloud.com/#/settings/user.
You'll also need to indicate the number of Sysdig Cloud agent containers to deploy. Marathon will automatically ensure that only one agent container is installed per node - so best practice is to provide a number that is greater than the total number of nodes in your cluster. This will ensure that as your cluster expands, new nodes will be automatically instrumented and monitored.
